result.eng: Would you like to win the lottery?
result.ga: Ar mhaith leat an crannchur a bhuachan
result.orig: Ar mhaith leat an crannchur a bhuachan
result.html: Ar mhaith leat an crannchur a bhuachanWould you like to win the lottery?
result.ponchtml: Ar ṁaiṫ leat an crannċur a ḃuaċanWould you like to win the lottery?

result.ga: Tá muid in ann an cluiche seo a bhuachan
result.orig: Tá muid in ann an cluiche seo a bhuachan
result.html: Tá muid in ann an cluiche seo a bhuachanWe can win this game.
result.ponchtml: Tá muid in ann an cluiċe seo a ḃuaċanWe can win this game.

result.html: Beidh an bua agamI will win.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ an bua agamI will win.
